sentences.en: a chaste kiss on the cheek
Abramov did not live a chaste life.
sentences.cn: 阿布拉莫夫生活不检点。

sentences.en: Although she could not see clearly in the darkness, she knew it was chaste and pure.
sentences.cn: 虽然在黑暗里她看不清楚, 然而她知道她的身子是清白的.

sentences.en: Comparatively speaking, I like chaste poetry better.
sentences.cn: 相比较而言, 我更喜欢朴实无华的诗.

sentences.en: He wrote in a chaste style.
Here the chaste Sarah heaved a loud sigh.
sentences.cn: 这时,贞淑的萨拉高声叹了一口气.

sentences.en: I love to mix with people chaste in mind.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢与思想纯洁的人来往.

sentences.en: Ione has but one vice - she is chaste.
sentences.cn: 伊俄涅唯一的缺点就是她洁身自好.

sentences.en: People in some religious orders remain chaste.
sentences.cn: 有些宗教修会的男女保持贞节.

sentences.en: She is sexually not so much chaste as prudish.
sentences.cn: 她在两性关系方面不太守节,只不过是表面正经而已.

sentences.en: She led a chaste decent life.
sentences.cn: 她过着贞洁正派的生活。

sentences.en: She was sexually not so much chaste as prudish.
sentences.cn: 她对男女关系与其说是注重贞节,毋宁说是持身谨慎.

sentences.en: The calm after the storm air, is like this pure chaste.
sentences.cn: 雨过天晴般的空气, 是如此的清净纯洁.

sentences.en: These girls are told by the nuns to be chaste.
sentences.cn: 修女们教这些女孩子要贞洁.

sentences.en: When did this fleeing woman who had maintained a chaste widowhood find a husband?
sentences.cn: 这守活寡的逃妇几时有了个新老公?

trans.tran_cn: 纯真的，（风格）简单的，没有经过性交的，（性生活）忠于配偶的
trans.tran_en: not having sex with anyone, or not with anyone except your husband or wife
